SCTX - Script Source:
scriptName mwbarAssScript

;this script is on the active_assassin_unique activator in Bs chambers. will need lots o' tweaking. - Mark

float timer
short creepstate
short distancecheck
short doorcheck
short door2check
short doOnce
short dayCheck

begin gamemode


	if ( doOnce == 1 )
		if ( GetStage fbmwTRAssassins >= 100 )
			fbmwlightUbar1UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar2UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar3UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar4UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar5UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar6UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar7UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar8UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar1UUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar2UUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar3UUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar4UUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar5UUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar6UUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar7UUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar8UUunique.Enable
			set doOnce to 2
		endif
	endif		

	if ( creepstate == 0 )
		if ( doOnce == 0 )
			fbmwlightUbar1UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar2UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar3UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar4UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar5UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar6UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar7UOUTUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar8UOUTUunique.Disable
			set doOnce to 1
		endif
	endif

	if ( GetStage fbmwTRAssassins < 80 )
;MessageBox "RETURNING FOR JOURNAL < 80"
		return
	endif

	if ( GetStage fbmwTRAssassins >= 100 )
;MessageBox "RETURNING FOR JOURNAL >= 100"
		return
	endif

	if ( distancecheck == 0 )
		if ( GetDistance Player > 192 )
;MessageBox "RETURNING FOR DISTANCE > 192"
			return
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwtrassassins.doorcheck == 1 )
		if ( GetStage fbmwTRAssassins < 85 )
;MessageBox "RETURNING FOR DOORCHECK=1 AND JOURNAL < 85"
			return
		endif
	endif

	if ( fbmwtrassassins.door2check == 1 )
		if ( GetStage fbmwTRAssassins < 85 )
;MessageBox "RETURNING FOR DOORCHECK=1 AND JOURNAL < 85"
			return
		endif
	endif

	if ( dayCheck == 0 )
		if ( GameDaysPassed > fbmwTRAssassins.FightDay )
			set dayCheck to 1
		endif
	endif

;this part clears sneak and starts combat if player moves from behind screens. avoids silly dialogue from assassins

	if ( creepstate >= 1 )
		if ( GetDistance Player >= 400 )
			fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.StartCombat Player
			fbmwHelsAssassin2REF.StartCombat Player
			fbmwHelsAssassin3REF.StartCombat Player
			fbmwHelsAssassin3REF.StartCombat Player
			set creepstate to 17
		endif
	endif

	if ( dayCheck == 0 )
		return
	endif

	if ( creepstate == 0 )
		if ( GameHour < 20 )
			if ( GameHour > 4 )
;MessageBox "RETURNING FOR CREEPSTATE=0, GAMEHOUR <20 GAMEHOUR > 4"
				return
			endif
		endif

		set distancecheck to 1
		set creepstate to 1
;set doorcheck to 0
		SetStage fbmwTRAssassins 85
		fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.Enable
		fbmwHelsAssassin2REF.Enable
		fbmwHelsAssassin3REF.Enable


	elseif ( creepstate == 1 )
		set fbmwTRAssassins.Assmove to 1
;fbmwHelsAssassin1REF->AiTravel 738 -228 -128 -> Go To Marker 1
		set creepstate to 2


	elseif ( creepstate == 2 )
;if ( fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.GetAiPackageDone == 1 )
		if  fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.GetDistance fbmwTRBarAssMarker1 <= 35
			fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.PlaySound3D 0TorchSOut
			fbmwlightUbar1UOUTUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar2UOUTUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar3UOUTUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar4UOUTUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar5UOUTUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar6UOUTUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar7UOUTUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar8UOUTUunique.Enable
			fbmwlightUbar1UUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar2UUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar3UUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar4UUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar5UUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar6UUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar7UUunique.Disable
			fbmwlightUbar8UUunique.Disable
			fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.Enable
			fbmwHelsAssassin2REF.Enable
			fbmwHelsAssassin3REF.Enable

			set creepstate to 3
		endif


	elseif ( creepstate == 3 )
		set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
		if ( timer > 5 )
			fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.Say 1helsass
			set fbmwTRAssassins.assMove to 2			
;fbmwHelsAssassin1REF->AiTravel 516 -100 -128 ->Go To Marker2
			set timer to 0		
			set creepstate to 4
		endif





	elseif ( creepstate == 4 )
;if ( fbmwHelsAssassin1REF->GetAiPackageDone == 1 )
		if fbmwTRBarAssMarker2.GetDistance fbmwHelsAssassin1REF <= 35
			set creepstate to 5
		endif

	elseif ( creepstate == 5 )
		set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
		if ( timer > 5 )
			fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.Say 1helsass
			set fbmwTRAssassins.assMove to 3
;fbmwHelsAssassin1REF->AiTravel 816 -2 -128->Go To Marker 3
			set timer to 0
			set creepstate to 6
		endif

	elseif ( creepstate == 6 )
		if fbmwTRBarAssMarker3.GetDistance fbmwHelsAssassin1REF <= 35
;if ( fbmwHelsAssassin1REF->GetAiPackageDone == 1 )
			set creepstate to 7
		endif

	elseif ( creepstate == 7 )
		fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.Say 1helsass
		set fbmwTRAssassins.assMove to 4
;fbmwHelsAssassin1REF->AiTravel 786 128 -128 ->Just Go To final Marker now
		set creepstate to 8



		if ( creepstate == 8 )
			if fbmwTRBarAssFinMARKER.GetDistance fbmwHelsAssassin1REF <= 35
;fbmwHelsAssassin1REF->AiTravel 243 164 -128
				set creepstate to 16
			endif
			

				if ( creepstate == 16 )
					fbmwHelsAssassin1REF.StartCombat Player
					fbmwHelsAssassin2REF.StartCombat Player
					fbmwHelsAssassin3REF.StartCombat Player
					set creepstate to 17
				endif
			endif
		endif
	end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 5181 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
